Our Vision A Regional Leading Sustainable,Innovative Bottel Water Provider Our Mission To grow through,exceeding costomers expectation providing premium products and services,in an innovative,safe,efficient and happy work place,while proactively being responsible towards our society and environment.
Downtown Dubai,PO Box \n12336,Dubai UAE
Mai Dubai is produced in a world class bottling and manufacturing facility equipped with the latest technology sourced from some of the best suppliers in the business and managed by highly skilled individuals. Before we put the label on our water it goes through a purification process that makes it worthy to wear the Mai Dubai logo. First it undergoes multiple stages of filteration then it passes through a high-tech purification. The result is the highest quality pure water. Health is important. That is why, in addition to essential minerals such as Calcium, Bicarbonate and Magnesium, Mai Dubai water is particularly low in Sodium; making Mai Dubai\'s 5 gallon bottle, the lowest in Sodium content amongst 5 gallon bottles in the UAE. Finally we blend in our precisely balanced food grade minerals making Mai Dubai water an ideal choice for drinking or cooking. From receiving of raw material to finished product, quality is constantly monitored through, computerized systems and supervised by a highly experienced staff. Please enter your email. Mai Dubai LLC is a semi government Bottled Drinking Water company operational since March 2014.
Based in Dubai, in the Yalayas Area on the Al Qudra street, Mai Dubai operates a state of the art Factory which runs and strict guidelines and follows local, regional and international procedures in production, bottling and safety. The factory is HACCP, ISO and ESMA certified holding the Emirates Quality Mark logo, and is also FDA approved. Mai Dubai since then has become a House Hold name in the United Arab Emirates, selling it\’s now iconic looking bottles, with distinguishing red colour in its logo, label and cap and. Mai Dubai\’s portfolio of products includes 5 Gallon bottles, small and mediums size bottles and cups.
In May 2016 His Highness Sheikh Mohamed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice President, Prime Minister of the UAE, and Ruler of Dubai along side His Highness Sheikh Hamdan the Crown prince of Dubai went on a tour of the Factory and were guided by Mai Dubai CEO Jay Andres and Mai Dubai Chairman of the Board His Excellency Saeed Al Tayer. Attendees included Mai Dubai management, Mai Dubai Board members as well as member of the Media. Mai Dubai is the only bottled drinking water company nominated in 2015 by the Dubai Municipality for Best Factory Award, and the only bottled drinking water company to have been awarded the highest Grade in Food Safety \“Grade A\” also by the Dubai Municipality. Today Mai Dubai exports it’s products to the GCC, Europe, Africa and Asia, and will continue to exceed its customers expectations and provide only the most premium products and services.

Hydration Calculator was made as an indicator of the levels of water you should be consuming based on basic information. Your specific needs may vary depending on other denominators not common to everyone else. \n\n If you are undertaking specific training programs or other medical related testing or activity, we suggest you verify your hydration needs with a professional or expert that is familiar with your specific activities. Consult your doctor before starting a new diet or exercise routine.
